A serious allegation necessitates a higher standard of proof compared to
a less weighty claim. In Re H and Others (Minors) [1996] 1 All ER 1, the
case concerned the care of children under the Children Act 1989 of the
United  Kingdom.  Whilst  acknowledging  the  degrees  of  the  balance  of
